pages.text: Wild bees, like solitary bees, live in nests found around the world but unlike solitary bees they will gladly move into a hive as well. Wild bees live primarily in the nether and the end.

pages.title: Slimy Bee
pages.text: Found living in slimy nests in swampy biomes. Slimy Bees prefer pollinating flowers found in swampy areas, but will also make do with flowers from other biomes..

pages.title: Crystalline Bee
pages.text: Found living in nether quartz nests in the nether. Glowing Bees prefer pollinating something containing nether quartz..

pages.title: Glowing Bee
pages.text: Found living in glowing nests in the nether. Glowing Bees prefer pollinating glowing blocks like glowstone or lamps.

pages.title: Magmatic Bee
pages.text: Found living in nether brick nests in nether fortresses. Magmatic Bees prefer pollinating magma blocks or nether wart.

pages.title: Ghostly Bee
pages.text: Found living in soul sand nests in the nether. Ghostly Bees prefer pollinating nearby soul sand.

pages.title: Ender Bee
pages.text: Found living in end stone nests on end islands. Ender Bees prefer pollinating the locally flora of chorus plants.

pages.title: Draconic Bee
pages.text: Rarely found living in obsidian pillars on the main island in the end. Draconic Bees pollinate by flying around in the end collecting nectar from the air. The will also nibble on dragon eggs if they get the chance.

pages.title: Sugarbag Bee
pages.text: This little stingless bee can bee found in warm areas. It produces a special type of super delicious comb.
